plot: The trials and tribulations of nightclub owner Ivan Kane and the burlesque dancers of his nightclub Forty Deuce as he tries to expand it into Vegas.
plot_en: The trials and tribulations of nightclub owner Ivan Kane and the burlesque dancers of his nightclub Forty Deuce as he tries to expand it into Vegas.
plot_es: The trials and tribulations of nightclub owner Ivan Kane and the burlesque dancers of his nightclub Forty Deuce as he tries to expand it into Vegas.
title: Forty Deuce
